channel.title: Yes, That's a Thing
channel.itunes:author: WonderAI
channel.itunes:summary: Daily two minute podcast exploring bizarre but real phenomena from cow cuddling to wedding guests.
channel.description:
Dive into a world of bizarre-but-true phenomena with "Yes, That's a Thing," where reality proves stranger than fiction. In under two minutes per episode, this daily podcast unveils fascinating trends, products, subcultures, and ideas that sound utterly implausible but are absolutely real. From cow cuddling retreats to professional wedding guests, each episode spotlights the peculiar corners of human innovation and culture.
Perfect for curious minds and conversation starters, the show delves into both fleeting trends and established niche communities, delivering concise, factual explorations of these remarkable phenomena. Whether you're an internet culture enthusiast or simply someone who enjoys being the most interesting person at brunch, "Yes, That's a Thing" provides the perfect blend of entertainment and genuine discovery in bite-sized episodes.
Disclaimer: This description is experimental and was generated by AI. It may contain factual errors.
